ProdPreview.Header: VStarcam C7815WIP HD WIF Network Camera
ProdPreview.Desc: C7815WIP HD WIF Network Camera,8-level user authority management, 8-level user authority management,can auto test chipset and software.support 128G TF card

values.name: SYSTEM SECURITY
values.value: 8-level user authority management, built in watchdog,can auto test chipset and software.

values.name: BUILT-IN DYNAMIC IP DOMAIN SYSTEM (FREE)
values.value: No need domain name, support dynamic IP.

values.name: MOBILEVIEW PLATFORM
values.value: No need install software, multi-channel mobile view, support mobile view alarm snapshot.

values.name: PLUG AND PLAY
values.value: Plug and Play technology applied.99% penetration rate. Only three steps to view image.

values.name: UID TECHNOLOGY
values.value: Unique scan UID to add camera, easy to operate, and highly confidential.

values.name: CMS
values.value: 1,4,9,16,25,36,64,81-channel central management surveillance system, no user limitation. Centralized monitoring, remote recording, remote playback.

values.name: PROCESSOR
values.value: Hi3518E processor,built in ARM9 @Max. 440MHz and High-speed video co-processor

values.name: COMPRESSION FORMAT
values.value: H.264 Baseline Profile@H.264 Main Profile@MJPEG/JPEG Baseline

values.name: NIGHT VISION
values.value: Dual IR-CUT Filter auto switch, 30pcs 850nmΦ5mm LED,15m IR distance

values.name: IP ADDRESS
values.value: Dynamic IP and static IP address

values.name: NETWORK ADAPTABILITY
values.value: can auto adjust stream and frame rate according to the bandwidth

values.name: RTP
values.value: Support RTP, can auto adjust time when restart after power failure.

values.name: ACCESSORIES
values.value: Power adapter, user manual, warranty card,mounting bracket,screws

values.name: ALARM NOTIFICATION
values.value: E-mail snapshot, FTP upload alarm pic

values.name: OPERATING SYSTEM
values.value: Win98 SE/ME/2000/XP/Vista/win7 IE5.0, NET4.5, firefox, chrome
